titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1652) to provide extended unemployment benefits to displaced workers, and to make other improvements in the unemployment insurance system.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1652) to provide extended unemployment benefits to displaced workers, and to make other improvements in the unemployment insurance system.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1652 (unemployment benefits extension).
